successes.title: HAND Stylus
successes.description: A finely crafted, pen-like stylus featuring the world's smallest (4mm) retracting, rotating, replaceable tip.

Pledges.description: ONE & DONE. One HAND Stylus in the color  and finish (gloss or matte) of your choice. Save $5 off retail. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select color and finish. FREE U.S. shipping. Add $10 for Canada, $15 for international shipping.

ONE PLUS. One HAND Stylus in the color and finish of your choice, plus one six-pack of replacement tips. Save $5 off retail. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select color and finish. FREE U.S. shipping. Add $10 for Canada, $15 for international shipping.

CUSTOM LASER ENGRAVING. One HAND Stylus engraved with up to 35 letters. Add $5 for a six-pack of replacement tips. Order additional custom engraved styluses separately. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select your colors and finishes. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $10 for Canada, $15 for international shipping.

LASER ENGRAVED. One HAND Stylus in the color and finish of your choice laser engraved with our slogan: HAND – The Mind's Cutting Edge; plus one six-pack of replacement tips. Save $5 off retail. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select color and finish. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $10 for Canada, $15 for international shipping.

MULTIPLE CHOICE. Add the number of styluses at $25 each ($35 each if you want styluses laser engraved with HAND – The Mind's Cutting Edge) + six-packs of replacement tips at $5 each to get the total pledge amount. Example: if you want 2 styluses without laser engraving and 2 six-packs your total would be 2 x $25 = $50 subtotal + 2 x $5 = $10 subtotal; final total would be $50 + $10 = $60 Grand Total. Save $5 on each stylus you order. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select colors and finishes. Add $10 for Canada, $25 for international shipping.

SIX-PACK. Six HAND Styluses, one each of the five colors + black, in your choice of either gloss or matte finish; plus 6 six-packs of replacement tips. Save $30 off retail. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select the finish you prefer. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $10 for Canada, $25 for international shipping.

BAKER'S DOZEN. One HAND Stylus in every gloss and matte color + 3 black styluses; plus 13 six-packs of replacement tips. 13 styluses and replacement tip six-packs for the price of 12. Save $85 off retail. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $15 for Canada, $30 for international shipping.

25 HAND Styluses in the colors and finishes of your choice, plus 25 six-packs of replacement tips. Save $125 off retail. Perfect for sharing with family, friends, and co-workers. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select your colors and finishes. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $20 for Canada, $35 for international shipping.

CUSTOM ENGRAVING. 50 HAND Styluses in the colors and finishes of your choice custom laser engraved with up to 35 letters, plus 50 six-packs of replacement tips. Save $250 off retail. Perfect for special occasion and corporate gifts, or as advertising specialties. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select your colors and finishes. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $35 for Canada, $95 for international shipping.

FREE CUSTOM LASER ENGRAVING! Save $500 off retail. 100 HAND Styluses in the colors and finishes of your choice custom laser engraved with up to 35 letters; plus 100 six-packs of replacement tips. Perfect for special occasion and corporate gifts, or advertising specialties. You'll get an email after the pledge ends to select your colors and finishes. FREE U.S. Shipping. Add $45 for Canada, $125 for international shipping.
